title: EAU-Guidelines
description:
The aim of the EAU Guidelines is to develop best practice urological recommendations that support clinicians in making informed decisions, taking both the highest quality scientific evidence and their patients’ individual values preferences into account. With the EAU Guidelines pocket app, you can quickly navigate the EAU pocket guidelines, use the interactive tools to aid clinical decision making, keep your favourite EAU Urology Cheat Sheets on hand, assess the most prominent scores and calculators, and navigate to the extended EAU Guidelines. EAU members receive exclusive free access to the full app whilst non-members can access the app with a 30-day trial.

This app is designed to serve as an educational tool for healthcare professionals and aims to provide supportive information that may assist in patient care. The content within this app is intended for use as a supplementary guideline and should not be construed as professional medical advice. Users, such as patients, caregivers, or community members, are advised to consult a qualified healthcare professional before relying on the information provided.

summary: EAU pocket app provides a summary of the guidelines for practicing urologists.
